channel.title: ðŸ‘Œ Ragefire-Empire 2.0 - Gameplay you'll Enjoy, Content to keep you Satisfied!
channel.description:
[CENTER][COLOR=#ff0000][B][SIZE=6].:: Ragefire-Empire 2.0 Official Server ::.[/SIZE][/B][/COLOR]
[IMG]http://topg.org/gallery/360915/3330.png[/img]
[COLOR=#ff0000][SIZE=5][B].:: A message to New Players ::.[/B][/SIZE][/COLOR]
[SIZE=4] It's advised for your own gaming experience, that you give Ragefire-Empire a try.[/SIZE]
[COLOR=#ff0000][SIZE=5][B].:: Does Ragefire-Empire have enough content ::.[/B][/SIZE][/COLOR]
[SIZE=4]Ragefire-Empire has a list of features that only grows. Some quick features to note: 100+ Tasks, Player owned shops, custom weapons, custom bosses, custom player vs monster combat, custom player vs player combat, a friendly community, gambling, and so much more![/SIZE]
[COLOR=#ff0000][SIZE=5][B].:: Will I be happy to be apart of the Ragefire-Empire Community ::.[/B][/SIZE][/COLOR]
[SIZE=4]You will be ABSOLUTELY pleased. The staff members are helpful and understanding. Rules are strictly enforced to ensure a positive environment. The owner dedicates most of his time to fixing the game and adding new content. You will not regret joining Ragefire-Empire!
[COLOR=#ff0000][URL=http://Ragefire-Empire.net][SIZE=5]CLICK HERE TO JOIN NOW![/SIZE][/URL][/COLOR]
[SIZE=4][COLOR=#ff0000][SIZE=5][B].:: Media ::.[/B][/SIZE][/COLOR] [/SIZE] [img]https://i.gyazo.com/df5364d42aab2525b7b843ab973c5c6d.png[/img]
[IMG]http://i60.tinypic.com/2qntijn.png[/img]
[img]http://i.imgur.com/OSS0Ex1.png[/img]
[img]http://i.imgur.com/JC63rB4.png[/img]
[img]http://i.imgur.com/veu6vP7.png[/img]
[img]http://i.imgur.com/5tSXBE8.png[/img]
[img]http://i.imgur.com/MzbesGx.png[/img]
[img]http://i.imgur.com/Gg72RKl.png[/img]
[img]http://i.imgur.com/5BxGAA3.png[/img]
[img]http://i.imgur.com/D7sHoOd.png[/img]
[img]http://i.imgur.com/UDNU5ER.png[/img]
[COLOR=#ff0000][URL=http://Ragefire-Empire.net][SIZE=5]CLICK HERE TO JOIN NOW![/SIZE][/URL][/COLOR]
[/center]
